title: Wont let me into game from Loading screen
body:
There has been many times where i have been put into the low prio que because the game wouldent put me in despite being 100% for quite sometime. Im currently going through that right now.

Ive tested the system (mac) with a couple of normal games but the second i try a ranked im having issues, tried restarting the slient, tried turning my internet on and off and it still wont let me in.

I Swear im getting constant black marks against my account for being afk when its actually the client thats bugged out.


Please help i dont know what more to do!
